text: Our pizzas are available in Margherita, Pepperoni, and Veggie.
We serve classic beef and veggie burgers with fries.
We are open from 10 AM to 10 PM every day.
Buy 1 Get 1 Free on all pizzas every Friday!
Try our fresh salads: Caesar, Greek, and Garden Salad.
We offer a variety of pastas including Spaghetti Bolognese and Penne Alfredo.
Our beverages include soft drinks, fresh juices, and milkshakes.
Order online and get free delivery on orders above $20.
Desserts available: Chocolate Lava Cake, Tiramisu, and Ice Cream Sundae.
Weekend special: Family Meal Combo with pizza, burgers, fries, and drinks.
Happy Hour: 20% off on all drinks from 5 PM to 7 PM daily.
We offer gluten-free and vegan options upon request.
